attributes.review: I wanted to see what was going on with Trump’s election campaign, but I didn’t want to enter my cell phone number to be on any sort list. It’s a really terrible app that didn’t provide me with any useful information.
attributes.title: awful app

attributes.review: I don’t like Donald Trump bye bye
attributes.title: Gen Z

attributes.review: He wants to make America great again back when he was able to get away with sexually harass women as a rich white man. He actually is just his dad’s shadow and is manipulated by white supremacists. Couldn’t find anything decent on this app as it was just full of his ugly face and name. His supporters are the true dumb sheep of America that are anti-Americans and more along the line of racist, misogynistic, homophobic, just full of ppl that are stupid regardless of how whitely they were educated. This app reflects that and we hope that after Biden gets his term, we are able to find better candidates. Definitely not bunker baby though. Cheers!
attributes.title: Just full of sexual harassment

attributes.review: There’s not much else I can say, this is the worst app I have ever seen. The content is so disgusting and revolting. The images, oh god the images are so offensive. My phone could not take it, I had to delete the app.
attributes.title: Terrible, worst app ever made

attributes.review: How can we be reduced to having this “man” as president again
attributes.title: Get thee behind me Trump

attributes.review: you will not silence us. no matter what you do to stop us, we will not back down. we will be heard. and even if you take away tiktok, there will be a new app because where there is demand, people will supply. you can try all you want to block out our voices, but you will fail tremendously and it will be your downfall. gen z is here to be the change because no one else would. we are here to fix what has been broken. WE will make america great again, and we will never try to silence the opinions of others. this year is the start of a revolution and we will fight with our entire lives to make the changes necessary to overcome the evil in this world. we are the generation that won’t back down and we won’t stop until we reach our goals. so f*ck you. way to lose votes. 🖕🏻
attributes.title: war has begun

attributes.review: I went to use this app for genuine use, to see if I could become a racist homophobic and just Terrible human being over all and as soon as I opened it my phone crashed. Ya know now that I think about it my phone even knows better than to let me download something like this inappropriate app. Worst app I’ve ever used! PLEASE GET RID OF IT!
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
